entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is mentioned as a recurring event in the story. The text does not provide further details about it.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who shakes hands with the stranger and seems to be making an inquiry of him. He is described as having a scarred face.

entities.name: stranger
entities.description: The stranger is introduced as a character who has a badly scarred face and a blue eye that does not blink. He shakes hands with Dumbledore and seems to be making an inquiry of him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who cannot hear the words Dumbledore is muttering.

relationships.description: Dumbledore shakes hands with the stranger, indicating a formal greeting or introduction.
Dumbledore seems to be making an inquiry of the stranger, who shakes his head unsmilingly and replies in an undertone.
